Justification for Request: Lutathera is a dynamic radioligand therapeutic whose clinical effect depends not only on radioactivity levels (Volumetric and Total Activity) but also on the Specific Activity and the mass ratio of labeled to unlabeled ligand. Therefore, FDA should refrain from approving any application unless these factors are demonstrated to be equivalent.
